meaning: अकामयः: अकाम्यः सन्तः स अस्मिन् विषये आस्तित्वात्। अकामयः (akāmayaḥ) means those who have no desires or those who are devoid of desires.स (s): देवी मीमांसा अस्मिन् काम्यविषये आस्तित्वात्। स् (s) indicates that the topic being discussed is related to the Devi Mīmāṁsā (an ancient Indian text that deals with the ritualistic interpretation of Vedic scriptures).Meaning: This phrase, "अकामयः स (देवी मीमांसा)" (akāmayas s), means that the topic being discussed is related to the Devi Mīmāṁsā and it is about those who are devoid of desires.
